  • Uses of Controller in hms.control

    Subclasses of Controller in hms.control
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    MenuController
    Abstract class that extends the `Controller` class, providing additional functionality for managing menu navigation and user password checks in the Hospital Management System (HMS).

    Class

    class 
    AdministratorMenuController
    Controller class for managing the menu options available to an administrator.
    class

    Controller class for managing and displaying a patient's appointments.

    Controller class for managing and processing replenishment requests in the hospital management system.

    Controller class for handling password reset functionality in the hospital management system.

  • Uses of Controller in hms.control.administrator.InventoryManagement

    Subclasses of Controller in hms.control.administrator.InventoryManagement
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AddMedicineController
    The AddMedicineController class handles the process of adding medicine stock to the inventory.
    class 
    InventoryManagementController
    The InventoryManagementController class manages the navigation and control flow for inventory management functionalities in the HMS system.
    class 
    RemoveMedicineController
    The RemoveMedicineController class handles the process of removing medicine stock from the inventory.
    class 
    SetStockWarningController
    The SetStockWarningController class handles the process of setting stock warning levels for medicines in the inventory.
    class 
    UpdateMedicineController
    Controller class for updating medicine inventory.

  • Uses of Controller in hms.control.administrator.ManageStaff

    Subclasses of Controller in hms.control.administrator.ManageStaff
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AddStaffController
    The AddStaffController class handles the process of adding new staff members to the system.
    class 
    DisplayStaffController
    Controller class for displaying the staff members in the hospital management system.
    class 
    ManageStaffController
    The ManageStaffController class serves as the main controller for managing staff operations, including adding, updating, removing, and displaying staff members.
    class 
    RemoveStaffController
    Controller class for removing staff members from the hospital management system.
    class 
    UpdateStaffController
    Controller class for managing the update process of different staff members (Doctor, Pharmacist, Receptionist).
